body_html:
multi-dimensional arrays incur an expensive copy in the interface between java and C++. Refer to
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/lite/java/src/main/java/org/tensorflow/lite/Interpreter.java#L217

ByteBuffer is the preferred way to pass large input data
body_text:
multi-dimensional arrays incur an expensive copy in the interface between java and C++. Refer to
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/lite/java/src/main/java/org/tensorflow/lite/Interpreter.java#L217

ByteBuffer is the preferred way to pass large input data
body:
multi-dimensional arrays incur an expensive copy in the interface between java and C++. Refer to 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/lite/java/src/main/java/org/tensorflow/lite/Interpreter.java#L217

>  ByteBuffer is the preferred way to pass large input data
